title: Longing by Mary Balogh
description:
Governess and mistressÃ¢â‚¬â€he wanted her as both.Ã¢â‚¬Â¦ The illegitimate daughter of an English lord, Sian Jones abandoned her heritage to live in a stalwart coal mining community in South Wales. 

Empowered by their cause, sheÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s engaged to be married to the leader of a revolutionary movement that is bracing itself against the tyranny of English mine owners. But SianÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s principles are unexpectedly shaken when she accepts a job as governess under Alexander Hyatt, the mysterious Marquess of Craille, the oppressive symbol of everything she has come to resist.

She never expected Alexander to upend all her expectations. He is sympathetic to her cause. He is a loving father. A man of wealth and position, he is fatally attractive. 

And he is offering his heart to the independent woman who has illuminated his life. Now, caught between two worlds, and between the promises and desires of two men, Sian must make a choice that will define her futureÃ¢â‚¬â€one that can only be made in the name of love.

Genre: Romance
